name: Mini Kika
introduction:
my name is Mimi Kika. I love finer things than beers and I'm a person that isn't afraid to go for a walk or go for a swim. For those in the know, I'm an English teacher and professional basketball player.
I read every single post on the internet, read and agree to share. Just send me a message (I will get in touch if interested) and I'll do the rest." (Just saying.)
